channel.title: Making ur character saying something when you do something
channel.description:
by the title, i mean when you click on "preach" with a god book, you say: "hale GOD NAME"
anyone know how to do that?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 10:31:04 PM[/size][hr]doesnt someone know?

item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

That’s pretty simple…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 09:59:08 AM[/size][hr][code]if (item_id == 3840 || item_id == 3842 || item_id == 3844 )
{
if(teleblock)
{
sendMessage(“You are currently teleblocked and cannot tele n00blet”);
}
else if (!teleblock)
{
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“ALL HAIL ECLIPSE245.”);
}
}

break;[/code]
